glsa.title: RPCSEC_GSS library: Buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: A buffer overflow vulnerability has been discovered in librpcsecgss.

background.p: librpcsecgss is an implementation of RPCSEC_GSS for secure RPC communications.

description.p: A stack based buffer overflow has been discovered in the svcauth_gss_validate() function in file lib/rpc/svc_auth_gss.c when processing an overly long string in a RPC message.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted RPC request to an application relying on this library, e.g NFSv4 or Kerberos (GLSA-200709-01), resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All librpcsecgss users should upgrade to the latest version:
